fr.sorbonne_u.components.endpoints

Class MultiEndPoints

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sorbonne_u.components.endpoints.MultiEndPoints
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AbstractEndPointI, MultiEndPointsI
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BCMMultiEndPoints

    public abstract class MultiEndPoints
extends java.lang.Object
implements MultiEndPointsI
    The class BCMMultiEndPoints partially implements generic multiple end points.

    Description

    White-box Invariant

     invariant       numberOfEndPoints > 1
 invariant       endPointsMap.size() == numberOfEndPoints || !serverSideInitialised() && !clientSideInitialised()

    Black-box Invariant

     invariant       true        // no more invariant

    Created on : 2024-07-11

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.Map<java.lang.Class<?>,EndPointI<?>> endPointsMap
      map from implemented interfaces to single end points.
      protected int numberOfEndPoints
      number of expected end points in this multiple end point.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description

      create a new multiple end points with the given end points; to be used to implement the method copyWithSharable.

      initialise a multiple end points instance.
